text: Loved the ambiance and decor. I had the vegetarian burger and my sister the classic cheeseburger with bacon. The food was okay but big portions. Good service, our waitress was really nice. Will definitely go back to try their drinks and grilled cheese!

I had been wanting to go for a while . And then I finally got my chance . My boss took me out for a birthday lunch .I wanted to try something very different.  I had a Mac and cheese burger.  There was no buns made of bread but 2 deep fried Mac and cheese cakes to surround the meat . The burger was quite different and very tasty.  I highly recommend it.  As for the kool aid flavored pickle i found it too sweet. Service was kinda of slow do to a big group before is but all in all I would try it again .
Love this place , great food every time you cant beat the service full bar amazing drinks , there's something for everyone and they even have a family section!

Une belle place pour manger a st-bruno ! Le mac'n'cheese est delicieux et les drinks sont cool ! La place est surprenante et l'ambiance est festive ! Bref, c'est une belle place pour manger et prendre un verre entre amis apres une journee de magasinage

Worst service. Was told table would be ready in 30 minutes, but when came back at the proper time, was told that because I have kids, the wait would be another 30 minutes. If they didn't want to service families with children, they should have told me this upfront rather than giving us the run around and waiting - had to deal with horrible service and grumpy hungry children.

You'd think Guy Fieri designed this menu. Crazy combination like peanut butter on a burger and deep fried Mac and cheese to replace burger buns.  Tons of poutine choice including one with blue cheese (yum). The size of my burger was huge and I couldn't finish it. Sweet potato fries were delicious and they brought a yummy spicy dipping sauce. They marinate their pickles in Kool Aid and the fresh coleslaw is also good. I'll be coming back to try the variety of creative dishes on the menu.
Excellente nourriture. Le service était vraiment médiocre. Les serveuses veulent trop aider et ils sont souvent 3-4 par table et elles viennent qu'elle se mêle entre eux.

We usually go to the one in Anjou, this time we were in this area so we headed to the one on the south shore.  The good: Food is still good. Service from Paulo is simply exceptional. Drinks are also on point.   The bad: Busy place. We hit our face to "do you have a reservation?" situation and we were told to wait 45 minutes (which ended being 20). In our four orders, two were truly mixed up, to a point where they had to take the plate back (but we had complementary donuts at the end for this issue). Some tables had plastic chairs, which brings down the value of the restaurant (other tables have good wooden chairs).  The service and food is simply great. It is the accumulation of the little things that needs to be fixed.

Je suis aller manger là plusieurs et je n'ai jamais été déçu ! Les hamburgers sont excellent, l'ambiance est bruyante par moment mais jamais dérangeante, les drinks sont tout simplement parfait !! Le décor est super beau aussi!

Pour une place de burger et de bouffe réconfort, j'ai vraiment aimé! Je jugeais un peu en croyant que ça allait être une autre "Cage aux sports", mais c'est vraiment tellement mieux! Les prix sont équivalents, mais les plats sont meilleurs et tu en as pour ton argent! Ça déborde de bouffe!  Y'a pas mal de plats qui sortent de l'ordinaire, genre le Mac'n'cheese aux Ringolos (c'tait bon!) et tous les grilled cheese viennent avec une petite soupe campbell aux tomates! J'aime bien le concept et ils l'exploitent très bien aussi!   Le service était bien aussi :) ! Bref, j'avais mal jugé, j'ai bien aimé!

Très similaire à celui qui se trouve sur Ste Catherine au centre ville mais en moins bruyant et plus familial (il y a des étagères avec des jeux de société!!). On y mange toujours aussi bien, du comfort food, on a une grande séléction de burgers, de poutiness, de mac and cheese, de grilled cheese et il y a également des salads :D  Le service est très amical et super efficace!
